schools.faq1_question: Do we need a teacher with engineering knowledge?
schools.faq1_answer: No. Our training is designed for generalist teachers. No technical background required.
schools.faq2_question: How long does the training last?
schools.faq2_answer: 1 to 2 months in hybrid format: online modules at your pace + 2 days in-person at your school.
schools.faq3_question: Are there recurring costs after purchase?
schools.faq3_answer: No. The 5,500€ excl. tax investment is one-time. The kit belongs to you. The teacher is autonomous.
schools.faq4_question: What age range is the program designed for?
schools.faq4_answer: Workshops are designed for children aged 5 to 10, with age-appropriate pedagogical progression.
schools.faq5_question: Are we affiliated with the LEGO group?
schools.faq5_answer: No. Brick & Brain is an independent company. We use LEGO compatible bricks but have no official affiliation with the LEGO group.
schools.faq6_question: Can we buy an additional kit for a 2nd group?
schools.faq6_answer: Yes. An additional kit is available from 2,000€ excl. tax. Training for a 2nd teacher: +800€ excl. tax.
